text: The Vagabond King is a 1956 American musical movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the 1925 musical of the same name by Rudolf Friml. It stars Kathryn Grayson, Oreste Kirkop, Rita Moreno, Leslie Nielsen, Jack Lord, Vincent Prince and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 movies Category:Movies based on musicals Category:1950s American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Vagabond King (1956 movie)
